definition: human shape/in human form/of human appearance/doll/puppet

sentences.english: Human Josh lifts the link rig and rubs his temples.
sentences.chinese: 人形的Jake掀開頂蓋，揉了揉自己的太陽穴。

sentences.english: The stone man was also carved on a stone that bears a little resemblance of a human being.
sentences.chinese: 石人也是用一塊略似人形的石料雕成的。

sentences.english: Sap will now work on more targets, humanoids , beasts, dragonkins, demons.
sentences.chinese: 悶棍現在可以攻擊人形生物，野獸，龍，惡魔。

sentences.english: The cream-furred Ebe is a rotund humanoid of small stature.
sentences.chinese: 乳黃色皮毛的埃貝是個身材矮胖的人形生物。

sentences.english: Dugs are slender, powerfully-built beings with a somewhat humanoid build and a unique method of walking.
sentences.chinese: 達格人強壯有力但身形苗條，體形略具人形。

sentences.english: Shoot the red ball with a humanoid cannonball.
sentences.chinese: 用類似人形的炮彈射擊紅色的求。

sentences.english: Pottery building with human-shaped pillar is a peculiar burial building of Han dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 人形柱陶樓是極爲奇特的漢代建築明器。

sentences.english: Bothans are a humanoid species characterized by stocky builds and fur-covered faces.
sentences.chinese: 博薩人是人形種族，身材短粗，面部有毛髮覆蓋。

sentences.english: Sheldon: What's funny about Cylon toast?
sentences.chinese: 人形塞昂麪包有啥可笑的？

sentences.english: The Ishi Tib are a species of humanoid bipeds with star-shaped heads.
sentences.chinese: 伊希提卜人是兩足人形種族，頭呈五角星形。

sentences.english: Your eyes searched that vagueness, and sought to make out the surroundings of the apparition.
sentences.chinese: 你的眼睛在迷霧裏搜索，想分辨出那人形四周的東西。

sentences.english: Gods start to take on a human form, so monotheism appears around this time.
sentences.chinese: 神靈開始人形化，於是一神教就在這個時候出現了。

sentences.english: It happens that the skeleton used to create the Humanoid Rig differs from the one in the animation file.
sentences.chinese: 骨骼過去經常創建出人形綁定，但有別於動畫文件。

definition: the real body (of Buddha or a God)/true effigy
main part/torso/the thing in itself/noumenon (object of purely intellectual perception according to Kant)
to spare time for a separate task/doppelgänger/sockpuppet (Internet slang)
